alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 4:20PM EDT until April 19 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Rutland, Eastern Rutland, and Eastern Addison Counties in Vermont. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will occur between 3 AM and 8AM Tuesday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland
